mapper.sql: id, code, username, password, realname, email, telphone, description, issys, enabled, priority, create_man_id, create_time, update_man_id, update_time, shop_id

where.if: and (o.username like '%${q}%' or o.realname like '%${q}%' or o.telphone like '%${q}%' )

mapper.select: SELECT o.id as id, o.code as code, o.username as username, o.password as password, o.realname as realname, o.email as email, o.telphone as telphone, o.description as description, o.issys as issys, o.enabled as enabled, o.priority as priority, o.create_man_id as create_man_id, o.create_time as create_time, o.update_man_id as update_man_id, o.update_time as update_time, o.shop_id as shop_id, s.shop_name as shop_name FROM sys_user o Left Join bus_shop s on o.shop_id = s.shop_id
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, code, username, password, realname, email, telphone, description, issys, enabled, priority, create_man_id, create_time, update_man_id, update_time, shop_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issys,jdbcType=BIT}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sys_user
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
issys = #{issys,jdbcType=BIT},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_man_id = #{createManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_man_id = #{updateManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_user set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issys = #{issys,jdbcType=BIT}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_man_id = #{createManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_man_id = #{updateManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
